findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: Active smart contract owner can blacklist certain wallets from interacting with the contract function modules and change buy and sell fees.

findings.title: Low severity issue
findings.description: The smart contract has a low severity issue which may or may not create any functional vulnerability.

findings.title: Active Smart Contract Owner Privileges
findings.description: Elevated impact on smart contract's safety and security

findings.title: External Vulnerability or Hack
findings.description: Smart contracts deployed on a blockchain are not resistant to external vulnerability or hack
findings.location: General smart contract security risk (not specific to DogeGiving)
